DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the front surface wettability of soft contact lenses while on eye.
DOC.brief_title: In-vivo Wettability Grading and Assessment Study
DOC.criteria: is at least 17 years of age has read and signed an information consent letter is a current daily wear contact lens wearer has acceptable fit with the study lenses has had an ocular exam in the last two years other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply has any ocular disease has undergone corneal refractive surgery or is aphakic has any systemic disease affecting ocular health is pregnant or lactating other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
